description.head: A floating pragma is set.
description.tail: It is recommended to make a conscious choice on what version of Solidity is used for compilation. Currently multiple versions "^0.5.0" are allowed.

description.head: MythX API Trial Mode.
description.tail: You are currently running MythX in Trial mode, which returns a maximum of three vulnerabilities. Sign up for a free account at https://mythx.io to run a complete report.
